import axios from 'axios' import React, { useEffect, useState } from 'react' import { Link } from 'react-router-dom' export default function ProductSingle(props) { const [data, setData]= useState([]) const productId = props.id const getProduct = ()=>{ axios({ url: "http://localhost:3001/product/view/", method:"post", data: { _id: productId } }).then((res)=>{ setData(res.data) }).catch((err)=>{ console.log(err) }) } useEffect(()=>{ getProduct() },[]) return ( <> { data.map((item,index)=>{ return(

About the item

Cheesecake is a classic dessert thats rich, creamy, and oh-so-decadent. Made with a smooth and creamy cheesecake filling, and a buttery graham cracker crust, this dessert is perfect for anyone who loves a sweet treat. Whether you’re celebrating a special occasion or just indulging in a guilty pleasure, our New York Style Cheesecake is the ultimate dessert that everyone will love. So go ahead, take a bite, and savor the rich and creamy flavor of our delicious cheesecake.
